entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 07:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: SSE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
